CurrentVersion.title: Whiteboard: Existing Azure Board Migration
CurrentVersion.description: This feature will migrate boards that exist in your tenant's Azure storage to OneDrive for Business storage. More information will follow as we near release.

OldVersion.title: Whiteboard: Existing Azure Board Migration
OldVersion.description: This feature will migrate boards that exist in your tenant's Azure storage to OneDrive for Business storage. More information will follow as we near release.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection for Word, Excel, and PowerPoint - Improved DLP policy tip reliability
CurrentVersion.description: Word, Excel, and PowerPoint for Windows now consistently show the same policy tips that SharePoint Online and OneDrive for Business sites have determined should be shown on a file.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection for Word, Excel, and PowerPoint - Improved DLP policy tip reliability
OldVersion.description: Word, Excel, and PowerPoint for Windows now consistently show the same policy tips that SharePoint Online and OneDrive for Business sites have determined should be shown on a file.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Modern eDiscovery in new Microsoft Purview Portal
CurrentVersion.description: Introducing a modernized user interface for key eDiscovery workflows, with simplified creation for cases, searches, and holds. Enhanced data source management allows for easy mapping of all data locations for users, groups, or Teams, with the ability to query location changes and frequent collaborator mapping. New search features include the ability to conduct precise searches using identifier (message ID), sensitivity labels, audit log, or evidence file. View key search statistics trends, including top data sources, sensitive information types, and content types. Long-running processes such as add to review and export now provide full visibility on progress and ETA, with detailed reporting on settings, query input, and item-level location reporting upon completion.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Modern eDiscovery in new Microsoft Purview Portal
OldVersion.description: Introducing a modernized user interface for key eDiscovery workflows, with simplified creation for cases, searches, and holds. Enhanced data source management allows for easy mapping of all data locations for users, groups, or Teams, with the ability to query location changes and frequent collaborator mapping. New search features include the ability to conduct precise searches using identifier (message ID), sensitivity labels, audit log, or evidence file. View key search statistics trends, including top data sources, sensitive information types, and content types. Long-running processes such as add to review and export now provide full visibility on progress and ETA, with detailed reporting on settings, query input, and item-level location reporting upon completion.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Pulse - Notifications management for administrators to configure where Pulse notifications are delivered
CurrentVersion.description: Pulse administrators can configure where Pulse notifications are delivered. This applies to Viva Pulse on the web and in the Viva app in Microsoft Teams.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Pulse - Notifications management for administrators to configure where Pulse notifications are delivered
OldVersion.description: Pulse administrators can configure where Pulse notifications are delivered. This applies to Viva Pulse on the web and in the Viva app in Microsoft Teams.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage – Questions surfacing in Copilot results
CurrentVersion.description: Viva Engage questions from communities, storyline, and Answers will surface in Copilot results.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage – Questions surfacing in Copilot results
OldVersion.description: Viva Engage questions from communities, storyline, and Answers will surface in Copilot results.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Prompt suggestions in Copilot chat
CurrentVersion.description: Get started in Copilot chat quickly with automatic prompt suggestions that enhance your productivity by providing relevant and context-aware prompts based on your previous interactions.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Prompt suggestions in Copilot chat
OldVersion.description: Get started in Copilot chat quickly with automatic prompt suggestions that enhance your productivity by providing relevant and context-aware prompts based on your previous interactions.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Insights- Copilot for Sales Metrics & PBI Report
CurrentVersion.description: Providing Copilot for Sales metrics for Viva Insights analysts in Advanced insights. Copilot for Sales adoption PBI report to provide a starter template to explore Copilot for Sales adoption across the organization.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Insights- Copilot for Sales Metrics & PBI Report
OldVersion.description: Providing Copilot for Sales metrics for Viva Insights analysts in Advanced insights. Copilot for Sales adoption PBI report to provide a starter template to explore Copilot for Sales adoption across the organization.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Customize who receives shift request notifications
CurrentVersion.description: We will not release this feature at this time. We are sorry for any inconvenience and will continue to share updated roadmap entries as additional features and functionality become available. To streamline your workflow and reduce notifications, we've enhanced our notification system so that shift request alerts are now exclusively sent to schedule group owners, and not all owners of a team. This targeted approach ensures that the right people receive the necessary updates, helping team owners maintain focus.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Customize who receives shift request notifications
OldVersion.description: To streamline your workflow and reduce notifications, we've enhanced our notification system so that shift request alerts are now exclusively sent to schedule group owners, and not all owners of a team. This targeted approach ensures that the right people receive the necessary updates, helping team owners maintain focus.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Copilot Analytics - Custom agent Power BI report in Viva Insights analyst workbench
CurrentVersion.description: Custom agent adoption metrics and insights report in Viva Insights analyst workbench. Scope includes custom agents created in Copilot Studio, insights are aggregated on the agent-level.
